title: Restore PlayPal gradient wordmark logo assets across PWA + Login

requirements.summary: Replace PlayPal logo image assets with the previous gradient wordmark + underline format and ensure all existing references (Login, PWA icons, Apple touch icon, service worker precache) continue to point to the same filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: The following static assets exist at frontend/public/assets/generated and visually match the requested style (gradient PlayPal text with an underline): playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png, playpal-logo.dim_192x192.png, playpal-logo.dim_180x180.png.

The Login screen (frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx) renders the updated logo image at /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png and the logo is visibly the gradient wordmark with an underline.
PWA metadata continues to reference the same logo asset paths (frontend/index.html apple-touch-icon and frontend/public/manifest.json icons), and the referenced files render the updated logo.
The production service worker precache list (frontend/public/service-worker.js) continues to include the same PlayPal logo filenames, and those cached files are the updated logo.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing 512x512 PlayPal logo image with the requested gradient “PlayPal” wordmark plus a single thin underline on transparent background, keeping the exact filename and dimensions (512x512).

Replace the existing 192x192 PlayPal logo image with the requested gradient “PlayPal” wordmark plus a single thin underline on transparent background, keeping the exact filename and dimensions (192x192).

Replace the existing 180x180 PlayPal logo image with the requested gradient “PlayPal” wordmark plus a single thin underline on transparent background, keeping the exact filename and dimensions (180x180).
Ensure the Login screen continues to render the logo from /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png and that no app-name text is changed (must remain “PlayPal”).
Confirm the Apple touch icon link continues referencing /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_180x180.png (no app-name changes; must remain “PlayPal”).

Confirm the PWA manifest continues referencing /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_192x192.png and /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png for icons (no app-name changes; must remain “PlayPal”).

Confirm the precache list continues to include /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_192x192.png, and /assets/generated/playpal-logo.dim_180x180.png so updated logo files are cached under the same filenames.
